Advance.name: 进军 Advance
Advance.description:
机动

你的军队尝试拉近一支非接战的目标敌军的距离，尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|traits:action:advance]{机动} 检定.

大成功 敌军和你的军队 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{接战} , 即使它处于 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]{远离} 状态 (在这种情况下它失去远离状态，陷入 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{接战}).

成功 如果军队有远离状态，它失去 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]{远离},否则，它陷 入 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{接战}.

失败 你军队的进军尝试失败.

大失败 你军队的进军尝试失败，并且队形混乱。陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.HbNAT8XxZD1OWMwE]{迟滞 1} ，直到它下个回合开始。

All-Out Assault.name: 全军突击 All-Out Assault
All-Out Assault.description:
[攻击] [骑兵] [步兵]

需求: 毫无怜悯Merciless

你军队以可怕的力量发起进攻。尝试对一支敌军的 AC 进行一次近战打击。

大成功s 你的军队对敌军造成 [[/r 3]]点伤害。如果你的军队在该回合内进行的下个战争动作是对一支不同的敌军进行的，你的怒火被延伸到新目标，你在打击上有+1 环境加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.zhHqV6jF0xhSADQT]{全军突击 All-Out Assault (大成功)}

成功 你的军队对目标军队造成 [[/r 2]] 点伤害。

失败 你的军队如同强弩之末，但依然对敌军造成[[/r 1]] 点伤害。

大失败 你的军队没有对目标敌军造成伤害，并且陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{被包抄} 状态，直到它的下个回合开始。

Battle.name: 战斗 Battle
Battle.description:
你的军队攻击敌军，使用打击对抗敌军 AC。你只有在和目标敌军@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{接战} 时才能如此做。否则，你只能使用远程打击。军队在一场战争遭遇中最多使用 5 次远程打击（除非他拥有增加弹药 Increased Ammunition 战术）。由于带有攻击特征，在同一轮中多次进行打击会遭受多重攻击减值。 攻城机械能使用战斗动作攻击和伤害防御工事。

大成功s 你对敌军造成 [[/r 2]]点伤害。

成功 你对敌军造成 [[/r 1]]点伤害。

Battlefield Medicine.name: 战地医疗 Battlefield Medicine
Battlefield Medicine.description:
[步兵] [散兵]

需求 Field Triage

Your army attempts to patch up an allied army’s wounds during battle.  Once you attempt this war action on an army, that army is temporarily immune to Battlefield Medicine for the remainder of the war encounter. Attempt a @Check[type:perception|dc:25|traits:action:battlefield-medicine]{Scouting} check to successfully sort the army’s wounded and provide swift aid.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.EUy6bVHHOrE5tVm3]{Battlefield Medicine Immunity}

大成功s You restore [[/r 2]] HP to the target army.

成功 You restore [[/r 1]] HP to the target army

大失败 Your attempt to heal the army fails, and that army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.eIQC69sOPbHAGxHC]{Weary} condition value increases by 1.

Counterattack.name: 反击 Counterattack
Counterattack.description:
[步兵] [散兵]r

需求 灵活战术 Flexible Tactics

触发 一支和你接战的敌军尝试一次机动战争动作。

当敌人尝试机动的时候，你的军队猛击敌人。对触发的敌人尝试一次近战打击，对抗其 AC。反击不应用你的多重攻击减值，你的多重攻击减值也不会因此增加。

大成功s 你对敌军造成[[/r 1]] 点伤害，增加它的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{动摇} 状态 1 点。

成功 你对敌军造成 [[/r 1]] 点伤害。

Covering Fire.name: 掩护射击 Covering Fire
Covering Fire.description:
[骑兵] [步兵] [散兵]r

需求: 弹无虚发 Sharpshooter

你军队用远程火力为一支友军的机动动作提供掩护和保护。尝试一次远程打击对抗目标敌军的 AC。

大成功s 你对目标敌军造成[[/r 2]] 点伤害，并且它无法使用由任意军队的机动战争动作触发的反应动作，直到你的下个回合开始。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.hGZBni0wBdgBo6mA]{掩护射击 Covering Fire (大成功s)}

成功 你对目标敌军造成 [[/r 1]]点伤害，并且它无法使用由任意军队的机动动作触发的反应动作，直到你的下个回合开始。

失败 你未能提供掩护射击，但仍然对敌军造成 1 点伤害。

大失败你的尝试失败了。

Defensive Stance.name: 防御姿态 Defensive Stance
Defensive Stance.description:
[步兵] [机动]

需求防御战术 Defensive Tactics

你的军队在盾牌后面蹲下，用长柄武器组成矛墙，或移动至能保护被包抄的友军的位置。对一支敌军尝试一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄}. Attempt a @Check[type:reflex|traits:action:defensive-stance]{[机动]} 检定。

大成功s The target allied army is no longer @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} by any army.

成功 The target allied army is no longer @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} by the target army.

大失败 Your defensive stance fails, and your army is now @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} by the target enemy army.

Dirty Fighting.name: Dirty Fighting
Dirty Fighting.description:
[散兵]r

需求 灵活战术 Flexible Tactics

Your army uses trickery, deception, and unfair tactics to attempt a devastating attack against an outflanked army. Attempt a melee Strike or a ranged Strike against the AC of a target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} army that is not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]{Distant}.

大成功s The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.eIQC69sOPbHAGxHC]{Weary 2} until the start of your next turn.

成功 The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.eIQC69sOPbHAGxHC]{Weary 1} until the start of your next turn.

大失败 Your attack deals no damage to the target army, which is emboldened by your failed attempt at dirty fighting. This reduces the target army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.eIQC69sOPbHAGxHC]{Weary} value by 1.

False Retreat.name: False Retreat
False Retreat.description:
[步兵] Morale [散兵]r

需求 灵活战术 Flexible Tactics

触发 Your army succeeds at a morale check.

Your army feigns defeat to trick an enemy army. Attempt a @Check[type:will|traits:action:false-retreat]{Morale} check against a target army.

大成功s The target army is caught off guard by your army’s deception. It becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} and is unable to take reactions until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.j7RCpCggLJw9Kf2l]{False Retreat (大成功s)}

成功 The target army is caught off guard by your army’s deception and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} until the start of its next turn.

大失败 The enemy anticipated your tactic and moves to take advantage of the situation. Your army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} until the start of your next turn.

Feint.name: Feint
Feint.description:
[步兵] [散兵]r

需求 灵活战术 Flexible Tactics

Your army launches a probing attack meant to trick the enemy into thinking you are attacking from one quarter while your real thrust comes elsewhere.

大成功s The target army’s defenses are thrown off; it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} until the end of your turn. 

成功 The target army is fooled, but only momentarily. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} against the next melee Strike your army attempts against it before the end of your current turn.

大失败 The enemy anticipates your feint and presses the advantage. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} by the target army until the end of your next turn.

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description:
[机动]

Your army spends a war action to adopt a defensive pose—raising shields, focusing on parrying attacks, or seeking cover. Attempt a @Check[type:reflex|traits:action:guard]{[机动]} check against a target army.

大成功s Your army gains a +2 item bonus to its AC until the start of your next turn; this bonus applies to all attacks against this army, not just from the targeted army.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.4aMsfeRodXmVm5HY]{Guard (大成功s)}

成功 Your army gains a +2 item bonus to its AC until the start of your next turn against attacks from the target army.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.X1ISHY0CaPXIsusg]{Guard (成功)}

失败 Your army fails to guard against the target army.

大失败 Your army fails spectacularly to guard against the target army and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.HbNAT8XxZD1OWMwE]{Mired 1}.

Outflank.name: Outflank
Outflank.description:
[骑兵] [机动] [散兵]r

需求 Reckless Flankers, you aren’t @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} 

You send your army around an enemy’s flank to get a better attacking position and to push your enemy into disorder. Attempt a @Check[type:reflex|traits:action:outflank]{[机动]} check against the target army. 

大成功s The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} until the start of your next turn. You can choose to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} with that army or not.

成功 The target army is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} until the start of your next turn. You are now @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} with that army.

大失败 You underestimate the target army’s position, and the blunder causes your army to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} until the start of your next turn.

Overwhelming Bombardment.name: Overwhelming Bombardment
Overwhelming Bombardment.description:
Siege

需求 Explosive Shot 

Your siege engines focus all their fire on a fortification. This war action counts as using two ranged Strikes for the purposes of depleting an army’s shots. Attempt a ranged Strike against the target fortification’s AC.

大成功s You deal [[/r 2]] points of damage to the fortification. You also deal [[/r 1]] point of damage to up to two armies of your choice that are within the fortification.

成功 You deal [[/r 1]] point of damage to the fortification, and an additional [[/r 1]] point of damage either to the fortification or to an army within the fortification (your choice of which).

失败 You deal [[/r 1]] damage to the fortification. 

大失败 You deal no damage, and your army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{包抄} until the start of its next turn.

Rally.name: Rally
Rally.description:
Morale

Your army’s leaders attempt to bolster the soldiers’ morale and fight back the effects of fear and panic. Attempt a @Check[type:will|traits:action:rally]{Morale} check against a target enemy army of your choice.

大成功s If your army is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.vUthCxz9am3slVR1]{Routed}, it loses the routed condition. 

Reduce your army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken} condition by 2.

成功 Reduce your army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken} condition by 1.

大失败 Your attempt to rally backfires—increase your army’s  @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken} condition by 1.

Retreat.name: Retreat
Retreat.description:
Prerequisites Your army is not engaged.

Your army tries to escape from the battlefield. If your army is already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]{Distant}, it flees the battlefield, is no longer part of the war encounter, and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.vUthCxz9am3slVR1]{Routed}. Otherwise, your army gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]{Distant} condition.

Disengage.name: Disengage
Disengage.description:
[机动]

Your army attempts to disengage from enemy armies to put some distance between itself and the enemy. Attempt a @Check[type:reflex|traits:action:disengage]{[机动]} check against each army your army is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} with. 

大成功s Your army is no longer engaged with the target army. In addition, your army is automatically no longer engaged with any armies you haven’t yet rolled a [机动] check against during this war action.

成功 Your army breaks free and is no longer engaged with the target army.

失败 Your army remains engaged with the target army.

大失败 Your army remains engaged with the target army and, for the remainder of this turn, your army cannot attempt to disengage from any army with which it is still @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged}.

Taunt.name: Taunt
Taunt.description:
Morale

需求: Focused Devotion

Your army attempts to frighten and cow an enemy army. Attempt a @Check[type:will|traits:action:taunt]{Morale} check against the target army.

大成功s The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken 2} until the start of your next turn.

成功 The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken 1} until the start of your next turn.

大失败 Your failed attempt bolsters the enemy’s spirits. This  reduces the target army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken} value by 1.
